description:
Updated to June 2016

Featuring Yoast SEO plugin 3.2.5 and WordPress 4.5.2

Do you really want to get to grips with WordPress SEO and implement a killer OnPage SEO strategy? 

And do you ever wonder why other websites get so much traffic and you’re getting so few visitors?

If you need a quick start with SEO for WordPress enroll in this course now.

Not many courses teach content silo theory but I do- it’s the secret sauce to rank keywords fast!

Once you have activated my personal list of 10 free plugins you will skyrocket your website.

Join me inside the course and I’ll take your SEO to the next level to achieve high rankings for your favorite keywords.

See you inside!
title: WordPress Samurai: SEO Rocket Meze
